DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics TC-5214 elderly healthy Japanese volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Single Multiple Ascending Doses TC-5214 Japanese Healthy Elderly Male Female Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Japanese healthy elderly male female ≥65 year old . Have BMI ≥18 ≤27 kg/m2 weigh ≥ 45 kg . Be able understand comply requirement study judge investigator ( ) . History clinically significant medical neurologic disease disorder . History gastrointestinal surgery unintentional rapid weight loss . Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure trauma within 4 week first administration study drug .
